content: knit a classic top-down raglan cardigan for a baby featuring a solid design or a vintage-inspired lace pattern begin by stitching in bernat softee baby with the body worked flat sleeves are then worked in the round on double-pointed needles both designs are uniquely attractive and gender neutral so pick the style you prefer and create a lightweight layer that no baby should be without it s a machine wash and dry garment that s available in 6 - 24 month sizes to fit chest measurement 6 mos 17 43 cm 12 mos 18 45 5 cm 18 mos 19 48 5 cm 24 mos 20 51 cm finished chest measurement 6 mos 19 48 5 cm 12 mos 20 51 cm 18 mos 21½ 54 5 cm 24 mos 23½ 59 5 cm
